modName: Fixing annoying repetitive dialogue by NPCs
summary: This mod fixes various annoyingly repetitive lines of dialogue. Inspired first by the annoying father chat from Adrienne in Whiterun but expanded
descriptionHtml:
This mod fixes (well I say fixes because it annoyed me, wasn't really a bug) the fact that Adrianne constantly says the same things to you, this mod makes it so she'll give you her "have you met my father" and "Do you think all the advice......" and her other unique greetings once only!
It also makes it so Camilla and Lucen will only thank you once for retrieving their claw!


Version 3

Now Camilla's daughter will only say "I work with my mother....." once
Farengar will only say "Come to dragonsreach..." and "If you have an aptitude...." Once
The annoying Cloud district line will only be heard once as well
author: NeilUK02

files.name: Fixing Annoying Repetitive comments- Adrienne Lucan etc
